summary: AI-based Smart Health Companion App - a modern, responsive website showcasing an integrated health platform that monitors fitness, diet, mental well-being, and preventive care with AI-powered analytics and emergency health alerts
architectural_notes: Modern, responsive website design with innovative, trustworthy, and user-friendly tone
AI-powered health analytics system for processing fitness, diet, mental health, and sleep data
Emergency health alert system with GPS integration for hospital/emergency service redirection
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern abstract health technology hero background with geometric patterns and gradients suggesting AI and wellness (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Minimalist icon representing integrated health monitoring showing interconnected health symbols (integrated-health-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Clean illustration of AI brain with health symbols radiating outward for solution section (ai-health-analysis.dim_512x512.png)
- Emergency alert symbol with medical cross and notification waves (emergency-alert-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with headline 'Your Complete Health, Powered by AI', subheading 'An integrated smart health companion that monitors fitness, diet, mental well-being, and preventive care â€” all in one place.', and two CTA buttons labeled 'Get Started' and 'Learn More'

Create a Problem section with title 'The Problem' explaining that many health apps focus on only one area (fitness or diet) while ignoring mental well-being and preventive care, with no single integrated solution providing a complete health picture

Create a Solution section with title 'Our Solution' describing an AI-based Smart Health Companion App that collects daily health inputs (food intake, physical activity, stress levels, sleep hours) and generates personalized health insights, preventive health recommendations, and smart lifestyle improvement suggestions using advanced AI analytics

Create an Emergency Alert Feature section with title 'Smart Emergency Health Alerts' explaining that the system monitors for abnormal conditions (extreme heart rate, high stress levels, critical sleep deprivation), automatically triggers alerts, notifies users immediately, and redirects them to the nearest hospital or emergency service using GPS location

Apply a modern, innovative, and trustworthy visual design theme across the landing page with a sophisticated color palette (avoiding blue and purple unless naturally fitting health context), clean typography, and cohesive layout that conveys professionalism and user-friendliness appropriate for a health technology platform
